Google Classification is CANNOT_BE_USED "Everything that Google undertakes, including research, is considered a commercial endeavor, so no code released under a license that restricts it to non-commercial uses may be used at Google. For example, works under any Creative Commons licenses containing NC (CC BY-NC, CC BY-NC-SA, CC BY-NC-ND) may not be used at Google."
